member.name: T:Enderlook.Unity.Serializables.Physics.Raycaster
member.summary:
Used to perform raycast with predefined parameters.
It can be either serialized in Unity inspector or construct using new.

member.name: T:Enderlook.Unity.Serializables.Physics.RaycasterWithOffset
member.summary:
Used to perform raycast with predefined parameters.
It allows adding offset to the on runtime without using or .
It can be either serialized in Unity inspector or construct using new.
